Header: Freak accident at ‘Yowun Puraya’ Sigiriya leaves teen injured
Content: A 17-year-old girl was injured when a digital banner at the ‘Yowun Puraya’ in Sigiriya collapsed on top of her yesterday. She was first rushed to the Dambulla hospital, but later transferred to the General Hospital in Kandy due to health complications. A hospital spokesperson said that her condition is not serious.
